name: Hey, #@&? That Other Cloud!
description:
Hey, #@&? That Other Cloud!

You are a cloud, and this other cloud really doesn't like you. There's only one way to settle your differences - donut warfare!

Armed with 4 unique types of donuts, you must jam it out with the other cloud to decide who is the bombest.

Move with the arrow keys, fire the different types of donuts using 1, 2, 3, and 4.
